short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Injects dark mode styles into Grailed.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Nothing too complicated. Just a CSS sheet that affects all relevant elements properly for a less-harsh visual experience. Email me if you notice any bugs and I'll fix them as soon as possible. 

Thank you!
